content: 5 metrics that separate growing SaaS companies from struggling ones. Which ones do you track? (Carousel below)

Last month, we almost lost a $50K/year customer.

Here's what happened (and how we caught it):

Day 1: Their engagement score dropped 23%
Day 2: Our alert fired. I personally reached out.
Day 3: Discovered they were frustrated with our new UI
Day 4: Rolled back their account to the old UI
Day 5: They renewed for 2 more years

Total time from alert to save: 72 hours

Without automated alerts? They would've churned silently.

This is why we built FlowMetrics.
